title: Neon Bank Fintech Dashboard
description: A high-performance trading dashboard with real-time data visualization.
fullDescription: Neon Bank required a complete overhaul of their customer-facing trading platform. We built a Next.js application with WebSockets for sub-millisecond data updates and D3.js for complex financial charting. The system handles over 50k concurrent connections with zero latency issues.
challenge: Legacy infrastructure was causing 2-second delays in quote updates, unacceptable for high-frequency traders.
solution: We implemented a custom WebSocket engine on Node.js and optimized the React frontend with Web Workers to offload heavy computations.
impact: 300ms faster load times and 40% increase in daily active users within the first month.

testimonial.quote: Klypso transformed our platform. The speed update is night and day.
testimonial.author: Sarah Jenkins

title: Solar Eco Monitoring
description: Sustainable energy monitoring PWA for residential use.
fullDescription: We developed a Progressive Web App (PWA) that connects to IoT solar inverters, allowing homeowners to track their energy production and consumption in real-time. Offline capabilities ensure data access even during outages.
challenge: Users needed to access data in remote areas with poor connectivity.
solution: A robust offline-first architecture using Service Workers and IndexedDB for local caching.
impact: Awarded Best Green Tech App 2023. Used by over 50,000 households.

testimonial.quote: Our customers love the app. It's fast, reliable, and looks beautiful.
testimonial.author: David Chen

title: Cyber Shield Audit Platform
fullDescription: A robust SaaS platform for conducting automated security audits and compliance checks for enterprise infrastructure. Features automated reporting and real-time threat detection.
challenge: Manual audits were taking weeks. Automated reports needed to be instant and accurate.
solution: Python-based scanning engines integrated with a React dashboard for real-time visualization.
impact: Trusted by Fortune 500 companies. Reduced audit time by 90%.

testimonial.quote: Efficiency is our priority. Klypso delivered a tool that saves us thousands of hours.
testimonial.author: Markus V.

title: Lumina VR Showroom
description: Immersive virtual reality showroom for real estate.
fullDescription: Lumina wanted to revolutionize property viewing. We created a VR experience that allows potential buyers to walk through properties from anywhere in the world using WebGL and WebXR standards.
challenge: Delivering high-fidelity 3D assets over the web without long load times.
solution: Draco compression for 3D models and aggressive texture optimization pipelines.
impact: Sales cycle reduced by 30%. Featured in TechCrunch.

testimonial.quote: The most immersive web experience we've ever seen. Sales are up.
testimonial.author: Elena R.

title: Flow CRM AI
fullDescription: Flow CRM needed to predict customer churn. We implemented machine learning models to analyze customer behavior and provide actionable insights to sales teams directly within their dashboard.
challenge: Integrating Python ML models with a Node.js backend seamlessly.
solution: Microservices architecture using FastAPI for the model serving and Express for the main API.
impact: 25% reduction in churn. Acquired by major tech conglomerate.

testimonial.quote: The predictive accuracy is frighteningly good. A game changer.
testimonial.author: Tom H.

title: Zenith Telehealth
description: Telemedicine app connecting patients with specialists.
fullDescription: Zenith aims to make healthcare accessible. We built a HIPAA-compliant mobile app featuring secure video calls, e-prescriptions, and appointment scheduling.
challenge: Ensuring end-to-end encryption and HIPAA compliance for video streams.
solution: WebRTC custom implementation with encrypted signaling and secure storage.
impact: 10k+ consultations in first month. 5-star rating on App Store.

testimonial.quote: Stable, secure, and easy for our patients to use. Perfect execution.
testimonial.author: Dr. A. Gupta
